The <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/serverguide | Ubuntu Server Guide project]]</nowiki> is part of System Documentation and, as such, everything that has been written on that topic applies equally here.  Please see the above links to understand the process of contributing to Ubuntu System Documentation.

One way to invigorate people to work on a project is to have a way for individual contribution to be seen in the context of the contributions from others.  This page will attempt to provide this by allowing people to publicly taking ownership of a part of the Server Guide for the upcoming Ubuntu release.

Here are the different ways to contribute, in order of priority:

# '''Technical''' review and correction of existing topics
# '''Style''' review and correction of existing topics
# '''Extension''' of existing topics (significant amount of new information, possibly new sub-topics)

Current release guide: <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/11.10/serverguide/C/index.html | Ubuntu Server Guide - Oneiric]]</nowiki> <<BR>>
Bugs: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/serverguide | Ubuntu Server Guide Bugs in Launchpad]]</nowiki>
